Package com.atakmap.android.routes

Class Route

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.FilterMetaDataHolder
      • com.atakmap.android.maps.MapItem
        • com.atakmap.android.maps.Shape
          • com.atakmap.android.maps.Polyline

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    URIContent, HashtagContent, Capturable, Exportable, AnchoredMapItem, CenterPointControl, MapItem.OnGroupChangedListener, MapItem.OnZOrderChangedListener, MetaDataHolder, MetaDataHolder2, VisibilityListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FloatingPointRoute, RouteTrackWrapper
    public class Route
extends EditablePolyline
    Handles automatic waypoint naming, stores metadata about the route.

      • getRouteDetails

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> getRouteDetails()
        Returns a list of arrays that describe the route details where the array is as described: [0] - callsign (set last) [1] - distance in miles [2] - distance in kilometers [3] - elevation change [4] - uid
